company.name: muuyal.io
company.tagline: Fast, scalable software development from Chihuahua, Mexico
company.description: We deliver high-quality React, Java, Spring Boot, and Node.js solutions with QA automation and nearshore outsourcing expertise. Build your next project with speed and precision.

services.title: Rapid Prototyping & Proof of Concept
services.description: Quick development cycles using Replit and modern development tools to validate ideas, develop proof of concepts, and deliver MVPs fast.

services.title: Full-Stack Development
services.description: End-to-end web application development using React.js, Node.js, Java, and Spring Boot. We build scalable, maintainable solutions from concept to deployment.
features: Frontend with React.js & modern UI frameworks
Backend APIs with Java/Spring Boot or Node.js

services.title: Odoo Installation & Setup
services.description: Complete Odoo ERP implementation including installation, hosting, configuration, and customization to streamline your business operations.

services.title: QA Automation
services.description: Comprehensive testing solutions to ensure your software is reliable, performant, and bug-free before it reaches your users.

services.title: AI Integrations
services.description: Integrate cutting-edge AI capabilities into your applications to enhance user experience and automate complex processes.

services.title: Nearshore Outsourcing
services.description: Dedicated development teams from Chihuahua, Mexico, providing cost-effective solutions with cultural alignment and convenient time zones.

services.title: Technical Consulting
services.description: Strategic guidance on technology choices, architecture decisions, and development best practices for your projects.

projects.name: BudgetBuddy
projects.description: A comprehensive personal finance management application that helps users track expenses, set budgets, and achieve financial goals with intelligent insights and automated categorization.
projects.problem: Users struggle to track spending across multiple accounts and categories, leading to budget overruns and unclear financial picture.
projects.solution: Built a React.js frontend with Spring Boot backend, featuring real-time expense tracking, AI-powered categorization, and intuitive budget management.
projects.results: 95% user satisfaction, 40% improvement in budget adherence, automated processing of 10,000+ transactions monthly.

projects.name: AI CV Builder
projects.description: An intelligent resume builder that uses AI to optimize content, suggest improvements, and format professional CVs tailored to specific job requirements and industries.
projects.problem: Job seekers spend hours crafting resumes that often fail to pass ATS systems or capture recruiter attention effectively.
projects.solution: Developed an AI-powered platform with React.js frontend and Node.js backend, featuring smart content suggestions, ATS optimization, and industry-specific templates.
projects.results: 85% interview rate increase, 2,000+ CVs generated monthly, 98% ATS compatibility score across major platforms.

projects.name: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Full-featured online store with inventory management, payment processing, and analytics dashboard.

projects.name: Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Real-time business intelligence platform with customizable widgets and automated reporting.

projects.name: Mobile API Gateway
projects.description: Microservices architecture with API gateway for mobile app backends and third-party integrations.

testimonials.content: The muuyal.io team delivered our fintech application ahead of schedule with exceptional quality. Their expertise in React and Spring Boot was evident throughout the project.
testimonials.author: Sarah Johnson

testimonials.content: Working with muuyal.io was a game-changer. They took our complex business requirements and created an elegant, scalable solution. Highly recommended!
testimonials.author: Michael Chen

testimonials.content: The QA automation setup from muuyal.io saved us countless hours. Our deployment process is now seamless, and we catch issues before they reach production.
testimonials.author: Emily Rodriguez
